metadata.title: CVE-2019-3561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient boundary checks for the strrpos and strripos functions allowaccess to out-of-bounds memory. This affects all supported versions of HHVM(4.0.3, 3.30.4, and 3.27.7 and below).

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
